page.title: 11Games Children Play
page.content: {TIGGY SCARECROW First of all you have someone{'on'. The person who is{'on'}runs after other people and tries to touch them. You are a{scarecrow}if you have been touched and you stand with your legs apart and arms out. {Scarecrows}are freed by going under their legs. If someone has been a scarecrow three times he/she is{'on'.} {SQUAD Say a rhyme to decide who's'on'.The person{'on'}counts to 50, with eyes closed,at a post.The others hide.When the person{'on'}has finished counting he has to find the others.When this happens he has to run to the post and {shout'squad'}and the person's name.The people hiding have to try to run to the post and shout{free-all.}If you all get freed the same person is'on'- if not the 1st person caught is'on'.
